<@U0265G76F> <@U0260V1BX> <@U1HKQRLMR> please test whenever is convenient for you (just before 3pm please) - and then let me + <@U1S5GKTHQ> know how it went with the specific time, and what browser/OS you were using, and then any thing that went awry

hey <@U167FL70V> and <@U1S5GKTHQ> — Did some attempts at testing longer videos on Chrome Version 55.0.2883.95 (64-bit) via MBP. 

First two tries, I let the timeline run out to full 2 min and had some odd bugs thereafter. Rather than moving to a submit state, it simply starts the recording over (red button) but all functionality doesn't work. 

Third try, I stopped recording manually at 1:59 and it worked. 

In all cases, during the recording state, the scrubber at bottom of video preview is out of alignment with the video. Looks like it's about 10 pixels to the left overall. Small thing, but made a note of it.
<@U0265G76F> thank you! will dig into this
ooh awesome thanks <@U0265G76F> that behavior at full 2 mins is similar to another bug someone else reported so good to have it confirmed

attachments.fallback:
[January 10th, 2017 4:14 PM] leia: <!channel> here’s the info for testing today: 

How to get there
URL: <https://www.millionwomensvoices.com/>
Username: demo
Password: W1ldFangMWV

Testing feedback

Please use the Uncorked tab on the testing spreadsheet and follow the steps outlined on the left hand side. For each case we’re asking that you give us a simple Y if the test worked, if it didn’t please encourage folks to give us as much detail as possible. In particular having the exact time, browser and OS will help us debug what went wrong when performing a post mortem.  

Spreadsheet: <https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1Pb3d5DJHsz1pl-A6qpnDMPWjnqY4VJd8l5HOC9dWQSM/edit?usp=sharing>

Known limitations:

Safari - mobile and desktop - upload videos only, no record. 
For all browsers and OS's we are only supporting the latest version.
